document: <sentence id="s1" text="This manuscript describes the case of a nine-year-old girl with microcephaly, mild facial dysmorphisms, epileptic seizures, and severe developmental delay, with a de novo heterozygous c.320AAAAAG [p.(His 107 peptidyl-tyrosine phosphorylation)] mutation in li>TUBA1A gene, and the clinical aspects and neuroimaging features of AAAAAAlissencephaly syndromeAAAAAA are summarized.">
